data.name: NavigationToolBar
desc: This service specifies the model for control which provides controller functionality for a DataForm, such as navigating or filtering the form.

properties.name: Border
desc: denotes the border style of the control.
Allowed values are

properties.name: Enabled
desc: determines whether the control is enabled or disabled.

properties.name: FontDescriptor
desc: contains the font attributes for the text in the control

properties.name: FontEmphasisMark
desc: specifies the emphasis mark for the font described in FontDescriptor
The value must be one of the com.sun.star.text.FontEmphasis constants.

properties.name: FontRelief
desc: specifies the relief for the font described in FontDescriptor
The value must be one of the com.sun.star.text.FontRelief constants.

properties.name: IconSize
desc: specifies the size of the icons in the control
At least the following values are to be supported:

properties.name: RepeatDelay
desc: specifies a repeat delay for the control
Some buttons of a NavigationToolBar may show repeating behavior, e.g. may be repeatedly triggered when the user keeps the mouse pressed over such a button.
The delay between two such triggers (in milliseconds) is specified with this property.

properties.name: ShowFilterSort
desc: determines whether the control should provide functionality for filtering and sorting the parent form

properties.name: ShowNavigation
desc: determines whether the control should provide functionality for navigating the parent form

properties.name: ShowPosition
desc: determines whether the control should provide functionality for positioning the parent form

properties.name: ShowRecordActions
desc: determines whether the control should provide functionality for acting on the current record of the parent form

properties.name: TextColor
desc: specifies the text color (as RGB value) of the control.

properties.name: TextLineColor
desc: specifies the text line color (as RGB value) of the control.
This color is used if the FontDescriptor defines that the text in the control should be underlined or stroke out.
